div.h1: COVID- 19 Public Guidance Regarding School Meals

img.alt: Visit CCSchools Facebook for more information

p.a: See Facebook Page for more information:

td.p: Revised due to "stay at Home" Mandate

tr.td: COVID- 19 Public Guidance Regarding School Meals
Ensuring children continue to receive nutritional services is of paramount importance during unexpected closures as many children rely on these school-based services for meals.Â

td.span: Â are eligible for free meals during school closures due to COVID-19!

tr.td: MealsÂ MAYÂ be picked up without children present
Please see the location and schedule below to find a meal site near you during school closures.
Â Until further notice, TO LIMIT EXPOSURE MEALS WILLÂ BE GIVEN OUTÂ ONLYÂ ONÂ MONDAYSÂ ANDÂ THURSDAYS
3 days of meals will be given on MondayÂ AND 4 days of meals will be given on Thursday
Fairfield Glade (Old church parking lot beside First National Bank)
Â Drive Up Grab and Go Sites:

Kathy Hamby, School Nutrition District Supervisor
